summary: Frontend UI testing for AAA gaming-level tactical ops UI transformation. All features tested successfully - login page, dashboard, claims list, inspections page, navigation, and logout all working correctly with tactical gaming theme.
critical_code_review_comments: Tactical theme CSS is well-implemented with proper gaming aesthetics (dark background, orange accents, glowing effects)
Badge/rarity system (common/uncommon/rare/epic/legendary/mythic) properly styled with Fortnite-inspired colors and glow effects
Military terminology consistently applied: Command Center, Garden, Recon Module, Mission Log, Intel Report, Quick Deploy, Targets
HUD-style elements properly implemented: corner brackets, scanlines, grid patterns, status indicators
All data-testid attributes present for interactive elements enabling robust automated testing
context_for_next_testing_agent: AAA gaming tactical ops UI transformation verified. All pages render correctly with dark theme, orange accents, and military terminology. Login flow works with test credentials. All 10 main navigation links tested and working: Command, Garden, Recon, Harvest, Pitch, Intel Hub, Scales, Eve AI, Docs, Contracts. Logout functionality working correctly.

elements_verified: ACCESS TERMINAL heading with crosshair icon
OPERATOR ID and ACCESS CODE labels (military terminology)

login_flow.verification: Successfully logged in with test@eden.com / password and redirected to dashboard

elements_verified: HUD-style stat cards (Total Claims, Active, Completed, Recon)
MISSION LOG section with recent claims
INTEL REPORT panel with Total Asset Value
Navigation items with tactical names: Command, Garden, Recon, Harvest, Pitch, Intel Hub, Scales, Eve AI, Docs, Contracts, Doctrine, Experts
Active state highlighting with orange accent
User profile with initials and role
Filter buttons: ALL, NEW, IN PROGRESS, UNDER REVIEW, COMPLETED
Claims cards with tactical badges (NEW, MEDIUM, SETTLED)
CAPTURE PROPERTY PHOTOS WITH VOICE NOTES subtitle
SELECT TARGET TO BEGIN empty state

logout.verification: Disconnect button works, redirects to login page

tactical_theme_elements_verified.colors: Dark zinc background (#09090B), orange accents (#EA580C), proper contrast
tactical_theme_elements_verified.typography: Rajdhani font for tactical headings, JetBrains Mono for monospace elements
tactical_theme_elements_verified.badges: Rarity system implemented (common/uncommon/rare/epic/legendary/mythic) with glow effects
tactical_theme_elements_verified.effects: Scanlines, grid patterns, HUD corners, glowing buttons, animated gradients
tactical_theme_elements_verified.terminology: Military/gaming terms: Command Center, Mission Log, Intel Report, Recon Module, Targets, Deploy
